title: Javascript is enabled, but is not functional.
content:
Hi - Javzscript Enable, though "True", still brings up the error "Enable Javascript". I spent hours on this, but nothing useful was found. Has any one had this problem, and if so, were they able to fix it?

Best regards, Nick.
creator: mr.nick

title: Opt-out language sync
content: I have two profiles on one computer and I want to use these profiles in different languages for web pages (one in English and one in my native language). If I sign-in the two profiles using one common Firefox account, this seems to be impossible: a change of the language setting in one profile immediately reflects into the other profile. Is there a way to disable the sync of language? I want histories and bookmarks to be synced across the profiles and thus I want to use the same account. Thank you.
creator: kazuma.tateiri16

title: I want my bookmark tab above other tabs
content:
I have always had my bookmark tab above/over my working tabs. but it is no longer there.

Uncle Dewey
creator: uncledewey

title: Password autofill keeps turning off
content: I keep having to turn password autofill on every time I start Firefox. I don't know why but for some reason it keeps turning itself off every time I close Firefox. This is extremely frustrating, please help
creator: galentheaviator
